Name: Dust Devil
About the game: DUST DEVIL Super hardcore coffee-break arcade. In the middle of street riots, you dodge motor officers, lasers, orbital beams and break cell mufflers on your hyper bike. The game is super fast and difficult: it has time limit and just a few checkpoints on your way to boss fights. With just one mouse button you control a swarm of bikers or a single agile rider. Your skills and tactics are that matters on each level. No grind, no character progression, just never stopping action. Ready, Steady, Go! 5 minutes to (beat the game) overthrow the government Minimalistic controls 14 levels from street riots to corporate rooftops 2 boss fights, no hitpoints Drift and outmaneuver riot cops Pick up duplicators to make bike swarms Brutal New Game +
